author: Kimberly Dozier
title: As Coronavirus Spreads, Washington’s $1 Billion Aid Cut Couldn’t Have Come At a Worse Time for Afghanistan
description: In Afghanistan’s western Herat province, Governor Abdul Quayom Rahimi is bracing for the worst. Last week, Rahimi recorded 61 confirmed cases of coronavirus in his region, all in Afghans who had crossed the border from Iran. This week, that number doubled, an…
